articles.content: Cao Maoyuan wins the gold medal with 9.770 points in the Men's Nanquan of Wushu at the 31st FISU World University Games on July 29, 2023. This is the first gold medal of the Chengdu Universiade and a… [+2931 chars]

articles.author: The Bridge Desk
articles.title: Sri Lanka Athletics: MR Poovamma returns after doping ban, Siva wins silver - The Bridge
articles.description: Asian Games medalist MR Poovamma returned after doping ban while Siva Subramani won silver medal at Sri Lanka Athletics C'ships
articles.content: Indian pole vaulter Siva Subramani won the silver medal in pole vault while Asian Games medalist quarter-miler MR Poovamma made a return after a doping ban at Sri Lankan National Championships on Fri… [+2091 chars]
